data.eml:eml: An example of a possible leech-bryozoan association in freshwater

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Klass, Anna L., Sokolova, Svetlana E., Kondakov, Alexander V., Bespalaya, Yulia V., Gofarov, Mikhail Yu., Tomilova, Alena A., Vikhrev, Ilya V., Bolotov, Ivan N. (2018): An example of a possible leech-bryozoan association in freshwater. ZooKeys 794: 23-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.794.28088, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.794.28088
